content: you are dedicated to a full cup make the following adjustments work only rnds 1 and 2 of part 3 for the surface of tea leaving a long tail for sewing work round 5 of part 2 front loops only so you can use the back loops to sew tea surface after lightly stuffing the cup enjoy patrick s teacup copyright © 2022 silvia-carmen comanescu 3 | p a ge
